description: Nova commands validate if a project id is present in context. Since Keystone V3, a domain scoped token can be generated, which do not add a project id to the context.
title: Nova does not work with domain scoped token

comments.content: Nova commands validate if a project id is present in context. Since Keystone V3, a domain scoped token can be generated, which do not add a project id to the context.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tiago-martins

comments.content: This is part of a bigger bug which is AFAIK nova doesn't understand keystone V3 API.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: What's the use case for having Nova accept a domain-scoped token? Keystone can also generate unscoped tokens, should Nova accept those too?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~blk-u

comments.content: Original problem was with V3 tokens:  this was in the RDO configuration, and not part of upstream Nova
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ayoung

comments.content: Does anyone still care about this? The blueprints referenced in comment 4 both look like there's no plan to make further progress. In addition, the last I heard, the nova team is not planning to support domain scoped tokens, in favor of using hierarchical projects to solve the same use case.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bpokorny

comments.content: Solving inconsistency: Unassigned. Hence, changing status from "incomplete" to "new".
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~pushkar-umaranikar

comments.content:
This wishlist bug has been open a year without any activity. I'm going
to move it to "Opinion / Wishlist", which is an easily-obtainable queue
of older requests that have come on. If you decide to work on this
consider using a blueprint [1] (with a spec [2]). I'll recommend to 
read [3] if not yet done. 

If there are any questions left, feel free to contact me (markus_z)
in the IRC channel #openstack-nova

References:
[1] https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/
[2] https://github.com/openstack/nova-specs
[3] https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/Blueprints
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller
